content: SHANGHAI Most online consumers in China will spend more during the Nov. 11 "Singles' Day" shopping promotion this year than they did last year  according to the results of a survey by consultancy Nielsen Holdings made available to Reuters on Wednesday.
name: Nielsen NV
title: China consumers to spend more in November 11 'Singles Day' shopping spree: Nielsen

content: SHANGHAI  Nov 4 Most online consumers in China will spend more during the Nov. 11 "Singles' Day" shopping promotion this year than they did last year  according to the results of a survey by consultancy Nielsen Holdings made available to Reuters on Wednesday.
name: Nielsen NV
title: China consumers to spend more in Nov 11 'Singles Day' shopping spree -Nielsen

content: May 27 Nielsen NV announced on Wendnesday that it is partnering with Tencent Holdings Ltd  to bring its Digital Ad Ratings service to China in a move that will accelerate growth of digital advertising spend in the market
name: Nielsen NV
title: CORRECTED-Nielsen to measure digital ads in partnership with Tencent

content: Nielsen NV announced on Wednesday that it is partnering with Tencent Holdings Ltd to measure its digital audience in a move that could direct more ad dollars from companies in the United States to China's biggest social network.
name: Nielsen NV
title: Nielsen to measure digital ads in partnership with Tencent

content: Nielsen NV  which provides viwership data for TV  said it had signed a deal with video streaming device maker Roku Inc to measure video advertising on Roku devices.
name: Nielsen NV
title: Nielsen to measure ratings on Roku devices

content: SINGAPORE  Feb 5 Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC has bought a 5 percent stake in Nielsen NV   a leading provider of TV audience ratings data  for an undisclosed amount  according to a regulatory filing.
name: Nielsen NV
title: Singapore's GIC buys 5 pct stake in TV ratings firm Nielsen
